languages.text: "Ты выросла прекрасной женщиной, Нааки. И пусть сейчас ты потеряна, я знаю, Император направит тебя на верный путь. Мы... гордимся тобой".

traits.locale_text: "Ты выросла прекрасной женщиной, Нааки. И пусть сейчас ты потеряна, я знаю, Неумирающий направит тебя на верный путь. Мы... гордимся тобой".

languages.text: "You have grown into a fine woman, Naaki. And though you may be lost now, I know the Emperor will point you right. We are... proud of you."
languages.original_text: "Ты выросла прекрасной женщиной, Нааки. И пусть сейчас ты потеряна, я знаю, Император направит тебя на верный путь. Мы... гордимся тобой".

traits.locale_text: "You have grown into a fine woman, Naaki. And though you may be lost now, I know the Emperor will point you right. We are... proud of you."
"You have grown up to become a fabulous woman, Naaki. And though you may be lost now, I know the Undying One will point the right way to you. We... are proud of you."
"You have grown into a fine woman, Naaki. And though you may be lost now, I know the Undying One will point you right. We are... proud of you."
"You have grown into a fine woman, Naaki. And though you may be lost now, I know the Undying One will point you right. We are... proud of you."
"You have grown into a fine woman, Naaki. And though you may be lost now, I know the Emperor will point you right. We are... proud of you."
"You have grown into a fine woman, Naaki. And though you may be lost now, I know the Emperor will point you right. We are... proud of you."
"You have grown into a fine woman, Naaki. And though you may be lost now, I know the Emperor will point you right. We are... proud of you."

languages.text: « Tu es devenue une belle jeune femme, Naaki. Et si tu te sens perdue actuellement, je sais que l'Empereur t'indiquera le droit chemin. Nous sommes... fiers de toi. »
languages.original_text: "You have grown into a fine woman, Naaki. And though you may be lost now, I know the Emperor will point you right. We are... proud of you."

traits.locale_text: « Tu es devenue une belle jeune femme, Naaki. Et si tu te sens perdue actuellement, je sais que l'Empereur t'indiquera le droit chemin. Nous sommes... fiers de toi. »

languages.text: «Ahora eres una mujer hecha y derecha, Naaki. Puede que ahora mismo estés perdida, pero el Emperador puede enderezarte. Estamos... orgullosos de ti».
languages.original_text: "You have grown into a fine woman, Naaki. And though you may be lost now, I know the Emperor will point you right. We are... proud of you."

traits.locale_text: «Ahora eres una mujer hecha y derecha, Naaki. Puede que ahora mismo estés perdida, pero el Emperador puede enderezarte. Estamos... orgullosos de ti».

languages.text: 「ナアキ、立派な女性に成長したわね。今は道に迷っているかもしれないけど、皇帝があなたを正しく導いてくれるわ。私達は…あなたを誇りに思ってる」
languages.original_text: "You have grown into a fine woman, Naaki. And though you may be lost now, I know the Emperor will point you right. We are... proud of you."

traits.locale_text: 「ナアキ、立派な女性に成長したわね。今は道に迷っているかもしれないけど、皇帝があなたを正しく導いてくれるわ。私達は…あなたを誇りに思ってる」

languages.text: “你已经长大成人了，拿基。虽然你现在似乎有些迷茫，但我知道，帝皇一定会指引你踏上正确的道路。我们……为你感到自豪。”
languages.original_text: "You have grown into a fine woman, Naaki. And though you may be lost now, I know the Emperor will point you right. We are... proud of you."

traits.locale_text: “你已经长大成人了，拿基。虽然你现在似乎有些迷茫，但我知道，帝皇一定会指引你踏上正确的道路。我们……为你感到自豪。”

languages.text: "Ihr seid zu einer wunderbaren Frau herangewachsen, Naaki. Und auch, wenn Ihr nun verwirrt seid, der Imperator wird Euch den Weg weisen. Wir sind ... stolz auf Euch."
languages.original_text: "You have grown into a fine woman, Naaki. And though you may be lost now, I know the Emperor will point you right. We are... proud of you."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid zu einer wunderbaren Frau herangewachsen, Naaki. Und auch, wenn Ihr nun verwirrt seid, der Imperator wird Euch den Weg weisen. Wir sind ... stolz auf Euch."

languages.text: "Düzgün bir kadına dönüşmüşsün Naaki. Şimdi kendini kaybetmiş gibi hissetsen de İmparator'un sana doğru yolu göstereceğini biliyorum. Seninle... Gurur duyuyoruz."
languages.original_text: "You have grown into a fine woman, Naaki. And though you may be lost now, I know the Emperor will point you right. We are... proud of you."
